data.eml:eml: Two new species of Caenohalictus Cameron, 1903 (Hymenoptera: Halictidae) from Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Celis, Cindy Julieth, Cure, Jose Ricardo, Aguilar-Benavides, Marlene Lucia (2014): Two new species of Caenohalictus Cameron, 1903 (Hymenoptera: Halictidae) from Colombia. Zootaxa 3786 (5): 574-586, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3786.5.5
